title: Climate Risks in the Financial System (Online)
description: Introduction to measuring and managing the impact of climate change on financial stability.

title: Annual training on Banking Supervision
description: Provides a comprehensive overview of the key concepts and latest developments in banking supervision, with a focus on the European framework.

title: Financial Soundness Indicators (FSI-C)
description: This course introduces the compilation and use of Financial Soundness Indicators (FSIs) for macroprudential analysis and surveillance of the financial sector.

title: Advanced Stress Testing for Financial Institutions
description: Deep dive into advanced methodologies for solvency and liquidity stress testing for banks and insurers.

title: High-level meeting on global banking standards
description: A meeting for senior officials on the implementation and effects of global banking standards and supervisory priorities.

title: On-site inspection – a practical training course
description: Provides participants with practical insights into the planning, execution and evaluation of on-site inspections at banks.

title: Macroeconomic Diagnostics (MDS)
description: Provides a rigorous foundation for assessing a country’s macroeconomic situation, identifying vulnerabilities, and formulating corrective policies.

title: FinTech and the Future of Finance (Online)
description: Examines the impact of digitalization, crypto-assets, and AI on financial markets and stability.

title: Systemic Macro-Financial Risk Analysis (MFRA)
description: This course provides participants with a comprehensive understanding of the theories, tools, and techniques needed to conduct thorough financial stability analysis.

title: Financial Stability Policies (FSP)
description: Presented by the IMF, this course provides a comprehensive overview of policies to safeguard financial stability, covering both micro- and macroprudential perspectives.

title: Applied Economic Forecasting (AEF)
description: A course by the Austrian National Bank on practical forecasting of key macroeconomic variables relevant for policy making.

title: Digital Finance and Regulation (Online)
description: This online course explores the main regulatory and supervisory challenges posed by the digitalization of finance.

title: Climate Stress Testing Seminar
description: A high-level seminar on the latest methodologies for climate scenario analysis and its impact on the banking sector.

title: International Banking Supervision and Regulation Seminar
description: Seminar for senior central bankers and supervisors on current developments in international banking supervision and regulation, including Basel III.
tuition_fee: Free for central bank and supervisory authorities

title: Monetary Policy (MP)
description: This course, presented by the Swiss National Bank, provides a comprehensive introduction to the theory and practice of modern monetary policy.

title: Financial stability – systemic risk, macroprudential policy and stability analysis
description: Participants will gain a thorough understanding of financial stability, systemic risk and macroprudential policy, with both theoretical and practical components.

title: Financial Stability Seminar
description: Covers the Fed's framework for monitoring and addressing risks to financial stability, including tools for macroprudential supervision.
tuition_fee: Free for central bank and supervisory authorities
